header.title: Drunk woman launches racist rant over sitting next to foreigners on flight
header.postText: A ‘drunk’ woman kicked and lashed out at other passengers on a packed plane before launching into a racist tirade at a Chinese man.', 'The air rage incident took place on a packed tourist flight from Barcelona to Kiev.', 'Local media reported that the woman had downed a bottle of whisky she had bought in Barcelona, before the brawl broke out.', 'She started attacking ‘foreigners’, including the Chinese man, who eventually had to move seats.', 'The unnamed woman then hit out at other passengers on the crowded flight who intervened to calm her, including a former TV presenter, Lidiya Polyanskaya.', 'At one point in the brawl, a male passenger in a black top is seen throwing a punch at the woman as the violence worsened.', '‘It was terrifying, nasty and scary,’ said one female passenger.', 'The woman was detained by police when the plane landed in the Ukrainian capital Kyiv.', 'It is unclear what charges or punishments she faces over the horrific air rage incident on the Ukrainian airline.', 'Reports did not specify if the woman was strapped into a seat and restrained before landing.', 'Passengers praised the stewardess for eventually diffusing the situation.', 'One witness said: ‘When the stewardess Lidiya Polyanskaya said in her professional TV presenter’s voice “Now you calm down!” – even I calmed down.”', 'The video, filed by a passenger, was posted with a message reading: ‘If you provoke a dangerous situation, attack passengers, injure people around you, make them anxious – please do not think that your actions will remain unknown.’', 'However, others took to social media to protests over the way the drunk woman was ‘beaten’ and attacked by passengers during the fight.

commentThread.commentText: Doesn't the stupid woman realise she's a foreigner in other peoples countries, she shouldn't drink if she can't handle it.

commentThread.commentText: And the snowflakes complain she was stood up to. I would have given her a Glasgow kiss.
Drunken Russian season is upon us again.

As I always say... You can't fix stupid. You can only sit and watch the inevitable train wreck that'll happen.It's an airplane coming from a foreign country, of course it'll have foreigners on it. It's up to the airline where to plonk passengers in the plane, not her. If she doesn't like it, she's free to walk home.
